channel.title: 000webhost help
channel.description: i downloaded a file to put on my website, it is a photoshop file but 000webhost wont let me upload it? when i try to upload it it takes so long then after 10 mins it says "the connection was reset" i used x10hosting before and that one worked perfectly.

well if its to run a server none they close you down for copyright now they have a deal with jagex

item.title: 000webhost help
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“webclientmaker, post:18, topic:518353”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=636616.msg4292911#msg4292911 date=1367649847]

I good free host would be biz.nf try them

does it have mysql etc?

The free version has 1, personal has 7, and business has unlimited. But, if you’re looking at the business package, I’d highly advise going to http://byethost.com/.

What is the best free webhost?
[/quote]

there is no best free host[/quote]
lol, lemme rephrase that for you, “What free webhoster would you recommend?”

item.title: 000webhost help
item.dc:creator: @webclientmaker webclientmaker
item.description:
@webclientmaker wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:3, topic:518353”][quote author=tigerclan link=topic=636616.msg4292183#msg4292183 date=1367514032]

i downloaded a file to put on my website, it is a photoshop file but 000webhost wont let me upload it? when i try to upload it it takes so long then after 10 mins it says “the connection was reset” i used x10hosting before and that one worked perfectly.

you get what you pay for
[/quote]
000webhost and x10hosting both have free and premium hosting options lol.[/quote]
there the same company and also own hosting24.com

Read full topic

item.title: 000webhost help
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

i was hosting a rsps but the thing is i wasn’t banned at once, i was suspended for not going on for a long time (week) and then i got unsuspended then suspended the next day for not going on :l

Read full topic

item.title: 000webhost help
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

With x10, were you hosting a private server website or anything? I know that if you are and get reported (or they find out) they will just suspend your account permanently…at least on the free hosting plan, that is.

Read full topic

just pay for cheap hosting. you can get it for like $10 or w/e

item.title: 000webhost help
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

idk man, cause when i got it unbanned the next day it was banned cause i wasn’t on :l
The main problem is i spent sooo much time on my forums but then it was all gone :’(

Lightshot

Screenshot

Captured with Lightshot

item.title: 000webhost help
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:6, topic:518353”][quote author=Ashley link=topic=636616.msg4292237#msg4292237 date=1367524362]

So that means i can’t upload a template on 000webhost?
[/quote]000webhost only allows up to 5mb per upload for free users. Not sure if its the same or more for premium.

x10hosting would probably be better.

yeah ;’( the only problem with x10hosting is if u dont acess your website in the portal mode everyday after 2 days (ish) it will get suspended, then i got it unsuspended then it got suspended again but this time for life :l[/quote]
I thought you only had to visit your site and cPanel at least once every 15 or 30 days. Or whatever amount of days it was. But it wasn’t everyday.

Read full topic

[/quote]000webhost only allows up to 5mb per upload for free users. Not sure if its the same or more for premium.

x10hosting would probably be better.[/quote]
yeah ;’( the only problem with x10hosting is if u dont acess your website in the portal mode everyday after 2 days (ish) it will get suspended, then i got it unsuspended then it got suspended again but this time for life :l
